talents.option2: +1.0 Armor Corruption to Visage and Familiars

abilities.desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.
abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.notes: Familiars within 900 range of Visage will also receive bonuses from Grave Chill.

abilities.desc: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 100 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.notes: Charges are only gained for damage greater than 2.0 and less than 3000.0 that is dealt by a player or Roshan.  Self-damage or Soul Assumption damage isn't counted.

abilities.desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.
abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.notes: Familiars within 900 range of Visage will receive the current damage reduction from Gravekeeper's Cloak.

abilities.desc: After a short delay, the nearest Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After 6.0 seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
abilities.name: Stone Form
abilities.notes: While Stone Form is not dispellable, the stun can be removed by strong dispels.

abilities.desc: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 35.0 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
abilities.name: Silent as the Grave

abilities.desc: Conjures blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.notes: Familiars within range of Visage will receive bonuses from Gravekeeper's Cloak and Grave Chill.

abilities.desc: After a short delay, the Familiar turns into stone and smashes into the ground, stunning and damaging all targets in the area.  The Familiar becomes invulnerable, and will regain its health very rapidly.  After 6.0 seconds, the Familiar will automatically leave Stone Form.
abilities.name: Stone Form
